title: Shadowheart
content:
choose the 2nd option so Nightsong will once again, interrupt your conversation with Shadowheart. Nightsong reveals that she knows of the only memory that Shadowheart has. The memory of her being hunted by wolves, and yet, Shadowheart still can't remember what she has lost. Shadowheart still believes that she is meant to become the Lady Justiciar, and you will get the next choices here:

Kill her. Let's finish this ritual. [PERSUASION] Don't do it, Shadowheart. Don't kill her, you'll regret it.
